Question: This person helped the offense set a NFL record for third down conversion rate in a season (56.1%).
Hints: This person led his 6th game-winning drive of the season and the Colts pulled away 31–21.
In the divisional playoffs, this person led the Colts to a 38–31 win over the Kansas City Chiefs.
At Denver, this person again led three scoring drives in the fourth quarter in a 34–31 shootout win.
